title: install matplotlib@2.0.0 fails
body:
With the current HEAD of spack, I see the following: 
```
$ git log --oneline -n 5
dec6b60 Updated llvm to version 4.0.1 Fixed indentation of dict literal (#5272)
c8df927 Add maintainer for Trilinos
aedf6c3 PR for RAFT tomography package (#5247)
a140a89 Fix allinea-forge and allinea-reports installation (#5243)
2aed82c Fix osu-micro-benchmarks build (#5255)

$ spack spec py-matplotlib %gcc @4.9.2                                                                                                                                                             
Input spec
--------------------------------
py-matplotlib%gcc@4.9.2

Normalized
--------------------------------
py-matplotlib%gcc@4.9.2
    ^freetype@2.3:
        ^bzip2
        ^libpng@1.2:
            ^zlib@1.0.4:
        ^pkg-config@0.24:
    ^py-cycler@0.9:
        ^py-setuptools
            ^python@2.7:2.8,3.4:
                ^ncurses
                ^openssl
                ^readline
                ^sqlite
        ^py-six@1.9.0:
    ^py-dateutil@1.1:
    ^py-functools32
    ^py-numpy@1.6:
    ^py-pyparsing
    ^py-pytz
    ^py-subprocess32
    ^qhull@2012.1:
        ^cmake@2.6:

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Error: An unsatisfiable dependency constraint has been detected for spec:

    py-pillow@3.2.0%gcc@4.9.2~freetype+jpeg~jpeg2000~lcms~tiff+zlib arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
        ^binutils@2.28%gcc@4.9.2+gold~libiberty~plugins arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
            ^bison@3.0.4%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                ^m4@1.4.18%gcc@4.9.2+sigsegv arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                    ^libsigsegv
            ^flex@2.6.4%gcc@4.9.2+lex arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                ^gettext@0.19.8.1%gcc@4.9.2+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-debian8-x86_64
                    ^bzip2@1.0.6%gcc@4.9.2+shared arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                    ^libxml2
                        ^pkg-config@0.29.2%gcc@4.9.2+internal_glib arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                        ^xz
                        ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@4.9.2+pic+shared arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                    ^ncurses@6.0%gcc@4.9.2~symlinks arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                    ^tar
                ^help2man@1.47.4%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
        ^libjpeg-turbo@1.5.0%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
            ^nasm
        ^py-setuptools@35.0.2%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
            ^py-appdirs@1.4.3%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                ^python@2.7.13%gcc@4.9.2+shared~tk+ucs4 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                    ^openssl@1.0.2k%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                    ^readline@7.0%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                    ^sqlite@3.20.0%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
            ^py-packaging@16.8%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                ^py-pyparsing@2.2.0%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                ^py-six@1.10.0%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 


while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    py-matplotlib@2.0.2%gcc@4.9.2~animation+image~ipython~latex~qt~tk arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
        ^freetype@2.7.1%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
            ^bzip2@1.0.6%gcc@4.9.2+shared arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
            ^libpng@1.6.29%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@4.9.2+pic+shared arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
            ^pkg-config@0.29.2%gcc@4.9.2+internal_glib arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
        ^py-cycler@0.10.0%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
            ^py-setuptools@35.0.2%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                ^py-appdirs@1.4.3%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                    ^python@2.7.13%gcc@4.9.2+shared~tk+ucs4 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                        ^ncurses@6.0%gcc@4.9.2~symlinks arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                        ^openssl@1.0.2k%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                        ^readline@7.0%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                        ^sqlite@3.20.0%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                ^py-packaging@16.8%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                    ^py-pyparsing@2.2.0%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                    ^py-six@1.10.0%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
        ^py-dateutil@2.5.2%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
        ^py-functools32@3.2.3-2%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
        ^py-numpy@1.13.1%gcc@4.9.2+blas+lapack arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
            ^openblas@0.2.20%gcc@4.9.2~openmp+pic+shared arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
        ^py-pillow@3.2.0%gcc@4.9.2~freetype+jpeg~jpeg2000~lcms~tiff+zlib arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
            ^binutils@2.28%gcc@4.9.2+gold~libiberty~plugins arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                ^bison@3.0.4%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                    ^m4@1.4.18%gcc@4.9.2+sigsegv arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                        ^libsigsegv
                ^flex@2.6.4%gcc@4.9.2+lex arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                    ^gettext@0.19.8.1%gcc@4.9.2+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                        ^libxml2
                            ^xz
                        ^tar
                    ^help2man@1.47.4%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
            ^libjpeg-turbo@1.5.0%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
                ^nasm
        ^py-pytz@2017.2%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
        ^py-subprocess32@3.2.7%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
        ^qhull@2015.2%gcc@4.9.2 build_type=RelWithDebInfo arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 
            ^cmake@3.9.0%gcc@4.9.2~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 


py-matplotlib requires py-pillow dependency py-pillow@3.2.0%gcc@4.9.2~freetype+jpeg~jpeg2000~lcms~tiff+zlib arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^binutils@2.28%gcc@4.9.2+gold~libiberty~plugins arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^bison@3.0.4%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^bzip2@1.0.6%gcc@4.9.2+shared arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^flex@2.6.4%gcc@4.9.2+lex arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^pkg-config@0.29.2%gcc@4.9.2+internal_glib arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^py-appdirs@1.4.3%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^py-packaging@16.8%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^py-pyparsing@2.2.0%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^py-setuptools@35.0.2%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^py-six@1.10.0%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^python@2.7.13%gcc@4.9.2+shared~tk+ucs4 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^readline@7.0%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^sqlite@3.20.0%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^tar^xz^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@4.9.2+pic+shared arch=linux-debian8-x86_64, but spec asked for py-pillow@3.2.0%gcc@4.9.2~freetype+jpeg~jpeg2000~lcms~tiff+zlib arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^binutils@2.28%gcc@4.9.2+gold~libiberty~plugins arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^bison@3.0.4%gcc@4.9.2 arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^bzip2@1.0.6%gcc@4.9.2+shared arch=linux-debian8-x86_64 ^tar^xz^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@4.9.2+pic+shared arch=linux-debian8-x86_64
```

At least upto ```be0e051 Add version 1.7.1 for cub. (#5164)``` this still worked.
